page.title: 08LANWADES BUSINESS PARK
page.content: In Kentford a Business Park has recently opened, where about 31 offices are rented out to people doing business. They always interview the people before renting the offices out to them, to make sure that they fall into the sort of class that they want. The people who rent the offices are usually in 3-4 days a week. Most of the offices are rented out for a period of 6 months, which then goes down to 3 months, after a period of a year, although the longest lease is 25 years. The Newmarket area is good to work in, because there is peace and quiet. Some of the businesses include: workshops, laboratories, hand painting figurines, upholstery etc.. The land, which was taken over from Dalgety Spillers 18 months ago once belonged to Lanwades Park.
